name: Walking Lunges
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
Hands on hips or at sides
steps: Step forward with one leg into lunge position
Lower hips until front thigh is parallel to ground
Back knee hovers just above floor
Push through front heel to stand and step forward with back leg
cues: Back knee lightly touches or hovers
mistakes: Front knee extending past toes excessively
safety: If knees feel cranky, reduce depth or step length. Great dynamic warm-up for legs.

prescriptionHints.notes: Excellent dynamic warm-up for legs, hips, and glutes.

joints.notes: Keep front knee tracking over toes. Avoid excessive forward lean.
